abstract: At “A Night of Philosophy,” more than 60 philosophers will hold forth on knotty problems in logic, ethics, metaphysics and religion

headline.main: Ready Thyself for an All-Night Philosophy Jam
headline.print_headline: All-Nighter for Mulling Life’s Broader Questions

snippet: At “A Night of Philosophy,” more than 60 philosophers will hold forth on knotty problems in logic, ethics, metaphysics and religion
